Verses: 1 jebavelaiyaagiya Onbadhaam Mani Neraththile Pedhuruvum Yovaanum Dhevaalayaththukkup Ponaargal.

2 appozhudhu Than Thaayin Vayitrilirundhu Sappaaniyaaip Pirandha Oru Manushanaich Sumandhukonduvandhaargal; Dhevaalayaththile Piravesikkiravargalidaththil Pichchaiketkumpadi, Naalthorum Alangaara Vaasal Ennappatta Dhevaalaya Vaasalandaiyile Vaippaargal.
3 dhevaalayaththile Piravesikkappogira Pedhuruvaiyum Yovaanaiyum Avan Kandu Pichchaikettaan.
4 pedhuruvum Yovaanum Avanai Utruppaarththu: Engalai Nokkippaar Endraargal.
5 avan Avargalidaththil Edhaagilum Kidaikkumendru Enni, Avargalai Nokkippaarththaan.
6 appozhudhu Pedhuru: Velliyum Ponnum Ennidaththilillai; Ennidaththilulladhai Unakkuth Tharugiren; Nasareyanaagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaale Nee Ezhundhu Nada Endru Solli;
7 valadhukaiyinaal Avanaip Pidiththuth Thookkivittaan, Udane Avanudaiya Kaalgalum Karadugalum Belan Kondadhu.
8 avan Kuthiththezhundhu Nindru Nadandhaan; Nadandhu, Kudhiththu, Dhevanaith Thudhiththukkondu, Avargaludanekooda Dhevaalayaththirkul Piravesiththaan.
9 avan Nadakkiradhaiyum, Dhevanaith Thudhikkiradhaiyum, Janangalellaarum Kandu:
10 dhevaalayaththin Alangaara Vaasalandaiyile Pichchaiketka Utkaarndhirundhavan Ivandhaan Endru Arindhu, Avanukkuch Sambaviththadhaikkuriththu Migavum Aachchariyappattup Biramiththaargal.
11 gunamaakkappatta Sappaani Pedhuruvaiyum Yovaanaiyum Patrikkondirukkaiyil, Janangalellaarum Biramiththu, Saalomon Mandabam Ennappatta Mandabaththile Avargalidaththirku Odivandhaargal.

12 pedhuru Adhaik Kandu Janangalai Nokki: Isravelare, Idhaikkuriththu Neengal Aachchariyappadugiradhenna? Naangal Engal Suyasakthiyinaalaavadhu, Engal Suyabakthiyinaalaavadhu, Ivanai Nadakkappanninomendru Neengal Engalai Nokkip Paarkkiradhenna?

13 aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalin Dhevan Thammudaiya Pillaiyaagiya Yesuvai Magimaippaduththinaar, Avarai Neengal Oppukkoduththeergal; Pilaaththu Avarai Vidudhalaiyaakkath Theermaaniththabodhu, Avanukkumunbaaga Avarai Marudhaliththeergal.
14 parisuththamum Needhiyumullavarai Neengal Marudhaliththu, Kolaipaadhaganai Ungalukkaaga Viduthalaipannavendumendru Kettu,
15 jeevaadhibadhiyaik Kolaiseydheergal; Avarai Dhevan Mariththorilirundhezhuppinaar; Adharku Naangal Saatchigalaayirukkirom.

16 avarudaiya Naamaththaippatrum Visuvaasaththinaal Avarudaiya Naamame Neengal Paarththu Arindhirukkira Ivanaip Belappaduththinadhu; Avaraal Undaagiya Visuvaasam Ungalellaarukkum Munbaaga, Indhach Sarvaanga Sugaththai Ivanukkuk Koduththadhu.
17 sagodharare, Neengalum Ungal Adhigaarigalum Ariyaamaiyinaale Idhaichseydheergalendru Arindhirukkiren.
18 kiristhu Paadupadavendumendru Dhevan Thammudaiya Theerkkadharisigalellaarudaiya Vaakkilum Munnariviththavaigalai Ivvidhamaai Niraivetrinaar.
19 aanapadiyinaale Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththilirundhu Ilaippaarudhalin Kaalangal Varumpadikkum, Munne Kurikkappatta Yesukiristhuvai Avar Ungalidaththil Anuppumpadikkum,
20 ungal Paavangal Nivirththiseyyappadumporuttu Neengal Mananthirumbik Gunappadungal.
21 ulagaththotramudhal Dhevan Thammudaiya Parisuththa Theerkkadharisigalellaarudaiya Vaakkinaalum Uraiththavaigal Ellaam Niraiverith Theerunkaalangal Varumalavum Paralogam Avarai Etrukkollavendum.

22 mose Pidhaakkalai Nokki: Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ennaippola Oru Theerkkadharisiyai Ungalukkaaga Ungal Sagodhararilirundhu Ezhumbappannuvaar; Avar Ungalukkuchsollum Ellaavatrilum Avarukkuch Sevikoduppeergalaaga.
23 andhath Theerkkadharisiyin Sorkelaadhavano, Avan Janaththiliraadhapadikku Nirmoolamaakkappaduvaan Endraan.
24 saamuvel Mudharkondu, Eththanaiper Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththaargalo, Aththanaiperum Indha Naatkalai Munnariviththaargal.

25 neengal Andhath Theerkkadharisigalukkup Buththiraraayirukkireergal; Un Sandhadhiyinaale Boomiyilulla Vamsangalellaam Aaseervadhikkappadum Endru Dhevan Aabiragaamukkuch Solli, Nammudaiya Munnorgalode Pannina Udanpadikkaikkup Buththiraraayirukkireergal.
26 avar Ungalellaaraiyum Ungal Pollaangugalilirundhu Vilakki, Ungalai Aaseervadhikkumpadi Dhevan Thammudaiya Pillaiyaagiya Yesuvai Ezhuppi, Mudhalaavadhu Ungalidaththirke Avarai Anuppinaar Endraan.
